      • announce

        public abstract void announce(AnnounceResponseListener listener,
            TorrentMetadataProvider torrent,
            java.net.URI tracker,
            TrackerMessage.AnnounceEvent event,
            boolean inhibitEvents)
                       throws AnnounceException
        Build, send and process a tracker announce request.

        This function first builds an announce request for the specified event with all the required parameters. Then, the request is made to the tracker and the response analyzed.

        All registered AnnounceResponseListener objects are then fired with the decoded payload.

        Parameters:
        event - The announce event type (can be AnnounceEvent.NONE for periodic updates).
        inhibitEvent - Prevent event listeners from being notified.
        Throws:
        AnnounceException

      • start

        public void start()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Close any opened announce connection.

        This method is called by Client.stop() to make sure all connections are correctly closed when the announce thread is asked to stop.

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • formatAnnounceEvent

        public static java.lang.String formatAnnounceEvent(TrackerMessage.AnnounceEvent event)
        Formats an announce event into a usable string.

      • handleTrackerAnnounceResponse

        protected void handleTrackerAnnounceResponse(@Nonnull
                                 AnnounceResponseListener listener,
                                 @Nonnull
                                 java.net.URI tracker,
                                 @Nonnull
                                 TrackerMessage.AnnounceEvent event,
                                 @Nonnull
                                 TrackerMessage message,
                                 boolean inhibitEvents)
                                      throws AnnounceException
        Handle the announce response from the tracker.

        Analyzes the response from the tracker and acts on it. If the response is an error, it is logged. Otherwise, the announce response is used to fire the corresponding announce and peer events to all announce listeners.

        Parameters:
        message - The incoming TrackerMessage.
        inhibitEvents - Whether or not to prevent events from being fired.
        Throws:
        AnnounceException
